DOC.brief_summary: Failure respond control ovarian hyperstimulation ( COH ) still major concern assist reproduction consensus ovarian stimulation choice regime poor responder . Aim : To evaluate compare efficacy microdose GnRH agonist flare ( MF ) GnRH antagonist/letrozole ( A/L ) protocols poor responder undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) . Methods : One hundred eighty poor responder patient randomized ovarian stimulation protocol either MF letrozole high dose FSH/hMG flexible GnRH antagonist protocol .
DOC.detailed_description: All woman receive 21 day oral contraceptive . A MF protocol use ovarian stimulation 90 patient . Three day last pill , GnRH-agonist buserelin ( Suprefact , Aventis Pharma , Frankfurt , Germany ) 50 µg SC twice daily initiate two day , recombinant FSH ( Gonal-F , Serono , Aubonne , Switzerland ) hMG ( Merional , IBSA , Lugano , Switzerland ) 300-450 IU/day administer . Ninetyty patient assign A/L protocol . After oral contraceptive withdrawal bleed day 3 cycle , recombinant FSH hMG 300-450 IU/day initiate letrozole ( Femara , Novartis , East Hanover , NJ ) 5 mg/day administer 5 day . When dominant follicle reach 14 mm mean diameter , ganirelix acetate ( Antagon , Organon , West Orange , NJ ) 0.25 mg SC daily start . Patients weill monitor serial vaginal ultrasonography measurement serum E2 level . When least two follicle mean diameter 18 mm achieve hCG ( Pregnyl , Organon , Oss , Netherlands ) 10000 IU administer . Cycle cancellation consider few two follicle normal growth pattern weill note . Oocyte retrieval perform 34-36 hour hCG administration . Conventional IVF intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) perform appropriate . Embryos 4-6 equally sized blastomers day 2 ≤ 20 % fragmentation multinucleation consider top quality embryo . Embryos 2-6 equally unequally blastomers ≤20 % fragmentation multinucleation consider good quality embryo . Embryos transfer day 2 3 ultrasound guidance , C.C.D . embryo transfer catheter ( Laboratoire C.C.D. , Paris , France ) . Luteal support progesterone oil ( Progesterone , Aburaihan Co. , Tehran , Iran ) 100 mg daily IM start day oocyte retrieval . Serum β-hCG level measure 14 day embryo transfer transvaginal ultrasonography perform 3 week positive β-hCG documentation gestational sac fetal heart activity . Clinical pregnancy consider presence gestational sac fetal heart activity .
DOC.criteria: least one previous fail IVF cycle three few follicle mean diameter 16 mm achieve , and/or serum E2 level measure day hCG administration ≤500 pg/ml day 3 serum FSH level ≥12 mIU/mL age limit
